text:
Hey team, looking to work with Emma Thompson for Red Rooster. Budget is approx $13,356 - need 1 x 90-second product demo, 3 x 15-second TikTok, 3 x Instagram post, 1 x TikTok video. 8 weeks exclusivity, 5 month engagement. Usage: 10 months. Start date: December 2025. Additional notes: TBC on exact dates, around $13,356 budget

Need to confirm: usage rights
